page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: In our area there are four different lots of building work being undertaken by two national building firms and two local firms.Swale Construction Company are building old people's homes in Byng Road.The work is being done for Richmondshire District council.There are seven bungalows and thirteen single flats.It is costing Â£380,000. The bungalows have a kitchen,lounge, bedroom,bathroom and store room.The other local building firm is Randall Orchard Construction who are building at Scotton Gardens.The firm bought derelict houses from the army and are revitalising them to sell as private houses.A two bedroomed house costs Â£20,250,a three bedroomed costs Â£22,750 and a four bedroomed Â£25,250.
